price: 30. Tolkayow! Yaa iiga gargaari oo iga celin Alle (Cadaabkiisa), haddaan eryo? Ee miyeydaan waansameyn?
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī mina al-lahi in ṭaradttuhum afalā tadhakkarūna
